title: `push` not working with snapshot of 0.13
body:
#### What is the problem? I was trying out a snapshot of datalad 0.13 that @mih deployed on a remote server and ran into problems with `datalad push`. @mih mentioned: "This likely means we need to backport tqdm." #### What steps will reproduce the problem? ``` loj@bulk1 in ~ ❱ datalad create mydataset [INFO ] Creating a new annex repo at /home/loj/mydataset create(ok): /home/loj/mydataset (dataset) ❱ cd mydataset ❱ touch file1.txt ❱ datalad save -m "create file" add(ok): file1.txt (file) save(ok): . (dataset) action summary: add (ok: 1) save (ok: 1) ❱ datalad siblings add --name jugit --url https://jugit.fz-juelich.de/loj/test [INFO ] Could not enable annex remote jugit. This is expected if jugit is a pure Git remote, or happens if it is not accessible. [WARNING] Could not detect whether jugit carries an annex. If jugit is a pure Git remote, this is expected. Remote was marked by annex as annex-ignore. Edit .git/config to reset if you think that was done by mistake due to absent connection etc .: jugit(-) [https://jugit.fz-juelich.de/loj/test (git)] ❱ datalad push --to jugit Push: 0%| | 0.00/4.00 [00:00datalad wtf

``` ❱ datalad wtf 1 ! # WTF ## configuration ## datalad - full_version: 0.13.0rc2 - version: 0.13.0rc2 ## dataset - id: 0880e76c-b46e-11ea-9c57-a0369f287950 - metadata: - path: /home/loj/mydataset - repo: AnnexRepo ## dependencies - git: 3.0.5 - gitdb: 2.0.6 - humanize: 0.5.1 - iso8601: 0.1.11 - keyring: 17.1.1 - keyrings.alt: 3.1.1 - msgpack: 0.5.6 - mutagen: 1.40.0 - requests: 2.21.0 - tqdm: 4.28.1 - wrapt: 1.10.11 ## environment - LANG: en_US.UTF-8 - LANGUAGE: en_US.UTF-8 - LC_ALL: en_US.UTF-8 - LC_CTYPE: en_US.UTF-8 - PATH: /home/loj/.dotfiles/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/X11R6/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games ## extensions - inm7: - description: INM7 utilities - entrypoints: - load_error: None - module: inm7_datalad - version: 0.5+10.g5f93ec5 - ria: - description: Helper for the remote indexed archive (RIA) special remote - entrypoints: - ria_remote.export_archive.ExportArchive: - class: ExportArchive - load_error: None - module: ria_remote.export_archive - names: - ria-export-archive - ria_export_archive - load_error: None - module: ria_remote - version: 0.6+6.ge755961 ## git-annex - build flags: - Assistant - Webapp - Pairing - S3 - WebDAV - Inotify - DBus - DesktopNotify - TorrentParser - MagicMime - Feeds - Testsuite - dependency versions: - aws-0.20 - bloomfilter-2.0.1.0 - cryptonite-0.25 - DAV-1.3.3 - feed-1.0.0.0 - ghc-8.4.4 - http-client-0.5.13.1 - persistent-sqlite-2.8.2 - torrent-10000.1.1 - uuid-1.3.13 - yesod-1.6.0 -
